title: If you're in a moving car and hear the athaan, must you pray in the MASJID? assimalhakeem JAL
transcript: hear the Adhan, do you still have to go to the masjid and train congregation if you're in a moving car? If you are in a moving car and you're not traveling, you are within the city and you hear the Adhan, you have to pray in the masjid. Whether it's this masjid you heard the Adhan from or if you time your arrival to a specific place to pray at that masjid. You are in the city so you have to pray wherever you are because you are driving and you heard the Adhan. you
